pages.text: The Datacenter is a massive sealed structure used to house Server Racks and regulate their temperature.$(br)$(br)It is a hollow cuboid.$(br)$(li)Min Size: 7x7x7$(li)Max Size: 32x32x32$(br2)Unless the configs were changed. The edges must be $(thing)Frames$(). The faces must be $(thing)Walls$().
The Controller replaces one of the wall blocks.

Walls must be any block with the tag $(thing)logicore:valid_datacenter_wall_block$().$(br2)Frames must be any block with the tag $(thing)logicore:valid_datacenter_frame_block$().$(br2)Inside can only contain blocks with the tag: $(thing)logicore:valid_datacenter_inner_block$().
